name: MindYourImage
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The moment you walk into a room you’re already judged. What do YOU think other people see? What if it’s not what you think? 

Knowing your personal brand image is the cornerstone to your success. 

Mind Your Image is like having your very own personal image consultant. Tune in daily and watch your influence and business grow.

You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
